name: 隱藏BADONGO廣告 (BADONGO No ADs)
description:
隱藏BADONGO廣告, 你只需要點擊 [ Install with Stylish ]
To hide wretch_ads, all you need to do is click on [ Install with Stylish ]

使用需求: Firefox 瀏覽器, Stylish 附加元件
Requirement: Firefox, Stylish
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("badongo.com") {
body>div>div>div>p,
body>div>div>div>div>a>img,
div#container div object,
div#container div object embed,
div#container div div[role="button"],
.adSquare,
.adFakeim,
.adPopunder,
.adInterstitial,
.adLeaderboard,
.adLeaderboard2,
#compare,
#adFakeim,
#adInline,
#extraBox1,
#adPopunder,
#banner_hold,
#wait_banner,
#wait_button,
#compareTitle,
#commentSpace,
#compareHeader,
#commentAddForm,
#adInterstitial,
#ft_wait_banner,
#small_wait_banner {display:none!important;}
}
